Item ID21024

The ancestral robe bottom is obtained as a rare drop from the Chambers of Xeric. It is part of the ancestral robes set, and requires level 75 in Magic and 65 Defence to wear. It can be stored in the magic wardrobe of a player-owned house.

 Attack bonuses

 Defence bonuses

[[File:Ancestral robe bottom detail.png|left|90px]]

The '''ancestral robe bottom''' is obtained as a rare drop from the [[Chambers of Xeric]]. It is part of the [[ancestral robes]] set, and requires level 75 in [[Magic]] and 65 [[Defence]] to wear. It can be stored in the [[magic wardrobe]] of a [[player-owned house]].
